verbs.description: [V: ronaldo] [ARG1: scores] 2 as juventus fights back to beat empoli 2 - 1 juventus missed mario mandzukic and giorgio chiellini it got by with cristiano ronaldo ronaldo scored twice as juventus came from behind to win at relegation - threatened empoli 2 - 1 on saturday josip iličić mario mandžukić juventus giorgio chiellini ronaldo milan empoli atalanta sami khedira kathryn mayorga mario mandzukic josip ilicic afriyie acquah cristiano ronaldo blaise matuidi
